reflections.text: Today I craved my salad formula instead of junk food!

timeline.title: Initial Goal: Lose 10 pounds
timeline.description: I want to feel more confident in my body

timeline.title: Adjusted: 10-day movement challenge
timeline.description: Found I really enjoy morning yoga flows

timeline.title: Current: Healthy eating habits
timeline.description: Created my own salad formula that I actually crave!

goals.title: July-Sep Gym
goals.description: This 3 month, I wanna rebuild my posture.

timeline.title: Week 1: Good Start!
timeline.description:
**The Good:**
- Gym became my second home
- Completed many workout sessions (training + treadmill)
- Made significant posture corrections
- Feeling life-changing progress!

**The Bad:**
- Didn't enjoy the diet most evenings
- Posture correction process was painful

timeline.title: Week 2: Problem found!
timeline.description:
**Progress:**
- Identified my posture problems
- Feel like the universe is helping me reach my goal
- My gym is perfect for my needs:
  - Great for Pilates training
  - Ideal for posture correction
- Showing strong workout commitment

**Observations:**
- Less tiring than Week 1
- Body is adapting to the soreness
